messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What is the main goal of unifying characteristics and skills?
to make it easier to compare and make opposed rolls using a mixture of skills and characteristics
You are a helpful assistant.
Why was Luck divorced from POW?
since the latter is of great significance elsewhere in the game
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the main intention behind the new system?
The intention is to make it easier to compare and make opposed rolls using a mixture of skills and characteristics.
You are a helpful assistant.
How is Luck currently handled in the game?
Luck is now rolled randomly (3D6 x 5).
You are a helpful assistant.
How is Occupational Skill Points generated in the new system?
EDU is no longer the only characteristic used to generate Occupational Skill Points.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the current method of rolling Luck?
Luck is now rolled randomly (3D6 x 5).
You are a helpful assistant.
Why did the developers decide against associating a characteristic with each skill?
The developers decided against this approach for three reasons.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the recommended conversion factor for characteristics in the game?
Divided by 5
You are a helpful assistant.
Why were the original ideas to link base skill in Charm to Appearances and Dodge to DEX not used?

Three reasons: using characteristic values introduces additional work during investigator creation, the benefit of using one-fifth of the characteristic did not seem significant enough to justify the added complication, and the characteristics feed into skill points to a limited degree.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the characteristic used to calculate skill points?
A variety of characteristics are used to calculate skill points, depending on your investigator’s chosen occupation.
You are a helpful assistant.
How do you get the full value of a characteristic?
Multiply the one-fifth value by five for the full value.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the possible values for the characteristic 'Characteristic'?
You are a helpful assistant.
How do you calculate the full value of a characteristic divided by 5?
Multiply the one-fifth value by 5 for the full value.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the process for calculating the one-half value of Luck points and hit points?
Multiply these by five for the full values and divide this new value by two, rounding down, for the one-half value.
You are a helpful assistant.
How do Damage Bonus and Build change in 7th Edition compared to 6th and 5th editions?
Lower damage bonuses have been changed in 7th Edition.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the purpose of the SAN characteristic in the game?
The SAN characteristic served only to set starting Sanity points.
You are a helpful assistant.
How are hit points calculated in 7th Edition?
In 7th Edition, hit points are derived by adding CON + SIZ and dividing by 10, rounding down.
